title: Where are my champions?
body:
So there was a patch today for the Ezreal rework and when i logged into my account i noticed that all my champions were locked (even though i owned all champions). I tried going into a custom game to check if i could use them but no champions were shown, then i went to the store and tried to buy champions but it said i already own these champions. Also i have tried repairing and reinstalling my league and noticed that my client has gotten slower

Umm someone please help me
Is anyone else experiencing this?
Was it to do with the patch?

replies.body: wtf i cant even login to client wtf is going on?
